S

save(boolean) - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.SaveLoad
In this save method, a BufferedWriter is implemented in a try-catch statement for the user to save his/her game, the specific location and health is saved onto the .dat file in another try-catch statement, the game objects location are saved as well as their specific information, such as health and location.
SaveLoad - Class in pyramid.plunder
In this SaveLoad Class, a BufferedWriter is implemented in a try-catch statement for the user to save his/her game, the specific location and health is saved onto the .dat file in another try-catch statement, the game objects location are saved as well as their specific information, such as health and location.
SaveLoad() - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.SaveLoad
 
saveScore(String, int) - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.HighScore
This saveScore method is passed down String name and Int score
setArmor(int) - Method in class pyramid.plunder.Player
This stopMove method uses the velocity for a stop and walking.
setHealth(int) - Method in class pyramid.plunder.Player
This stopMove method uses the velocity for a stop and walking.
setInteractPhysics(boolean) - Method in class pyramid.plunder.GameObject
This setInteractPhysics method assigns the interactPhysics to newValue, it is passed down the boolean newValue.
setKeyTime(int) - Method in class pyramid.plunder.GameObject
This setKeyTime assigns maxKeyTime to time and keyTime to time, it receives the int time.
setLoc(int[]) - Method in class pyramid.plunder.GameObject
This setLoc method returns the location as newLoc and receives the int newLoc.
setMoney(int) - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.GameRunner
This setMoney method is passed down int money and money is defined as GameRunner money.
setSize(int[]) - Method in class pyramid.plunder.GameObject
This setSize method returns the int size and follows a 'this size.'
setUpShop() - Method in class pyramid.plunder.LevelMenu
This setUpShop method creates the Resources Shop for randomly generated weapons and materials; this creates various messages to engage the user, options of Buy, Sell, and Coins are also made.
setUpStart() - Method in class pyramid.plunder.LevelMenu
In this setUpStart method, the Pyramid Difficulty are set through the Explore Pyramids Option; Easy, Medium, Hard, Pyramid of Khafre, Pyramid of Horus, Pyramid of Ra, and Pyramid of Ma'at are set here with distinct features.
setVelocity(float[]) - Method in class pyramid.plunder.PhysicsObject
This method sets the objects velocity.
setWeapon(Weapon) - Method in class pyramid.plunder.Player
 
Shader - Class in pyramid.plunder
This Shader Class extends the Drawable Method; this class uses various for loops to create the background; the fade and time is also passed to this class.
Shader(float) - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.Shader
 
sightDistance - Variable in class pyramid.plunder.NPC
 
SmallGun - Class in pyramid.plunder
This SmallGun class extends the Weapon Class; where the characteristics of the small gun are implemented and where the Draw Method draws the gun and defines the location with the sprite.
SmallGun(int) - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.SmallGun
The Small Gun is passed down int damage, the range of 300 by 300 is defined, and other characteristics of multihit and and damage to enemies is implemented.
SmallGun(int, int, int, int, String) - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.SmallGun
 
Snake - Class in pyramid.plunder
This Snake Class extends the NPC; the random locations and characteristics of sprite images, health, armor, speed, attack, moveAtRest, and jump are implemented in the game.
Snake(int, int) - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.Snake
The Snake is passed down locX and locY, which are used to define the location of the Mummy.
sound - Variable in class pyramid.plunder.NPC
 
speed - Variable in class pyramid.plunder.NPC
 
start() - Method in class pyramid.plunder.MainMenu
This method draws the initial background for the menu, and creates the frame; the title of Pyramid Plunder is defined and the Main Menu as well.
startGame(String) - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.MainMenu
This startGame method is passed down String name; a if-else statement is used for the LevelMenu and GameRunner; the frame is able to be disposed.
StartMenu - Class in pyramid.plunder
This StartMenu extends the JPanel; this class sets the title and dimensions of the start menu; this sets up the various options available for the user- such as, Log in as a New User, and Log in as an Existing User- the username and password text file and log error is also set up.
StartMenu() - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.StartMenu
 
stopMove() - Method in class pyramid.plunder.Player
This stopMove method uses the velocity for a stop and walking.
swapWeapons(int) - Static method in class pyramid.plunder.GameRunner
This swapWeapons method is passed down int newWeapon; the playerKey is set according to the weapons.
switchImage() - Method in class pyramid.plunder.GameObject
This switchImage method uses a try-catch statement in order to switch the images for the various sprite.
switchImage() - Method in class pyramid.plunder.NPC
In this switchImage method, the player and multiple enemies are implemented to attack and jump.
switchImage() - Method in class pyramid.plunder.Player
This Player Class extends the PhysicsObject class.
Sword - Class in pyramid.plunder
This Sword class extends Weapons class; the various characteristics of the sword are implemented, the sword is drawn here through the Draw method and Graphics g.
Sword(int) - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.Sword
Sword here is passed down the int damage, used for the attack; other characteristics like range and hits are implemented.
Sword(int[], int, int, int, int, String) - Constructor for class pyramid.plunder.Sword
This Sword is passed down int graphis, int damage, int rangeX, int rangeY, int speed, and String name; through the use of these, the sword is given more characteristics such as range, type, damage, multihit, and cool down time.
